dict.acceptation: 洗涤；洗涤剂；正在洗或待洗的衣服；洗下的污垢；

sent.orig: Additionally, we also process such garment finishing business as sand washing, conventional washing and atone washing.
sent.trans: 另外，我们也处理服装的后处理问题例如沙洗，传统的水洗以及石磨水洗。

sent.orig: Washing machines: the same capacity, water-saving washing machines and ordinary washing machines spread around 500 yuan.
sent.trans: 洗衣机：相同容量下，节水洗衣机与普通洗衣机差价500元左右。

sent.orig: The country's largest manufacturer of washing equipment-washing machines oceanic.
sent.trans: 全国最大的洗涤设备制造商-通洋洗涤机械。

sent.orig: Small size washing machine, very suitable for young mother with infant for washing dipers!
sent.trans: 小小洗衣机，适合带婴儿的年轻母亲！

sent.orig: The washing device can simplify a washing process, and has convenient operation.
sent.trans: 该洗涤装置可使洗涤过程简单，操作方便。
